ygData.subject: Re: Illedgible Cantrip??? Doh!
ygData.msgSnippet: i found an illegible scroll, also off an orc oracle.  i was told it is for a paladin quest.  possibly the cantrip is for the same, or possibly for alchemy.  as
ygData.messageBody:
i found an illegible scroll, also off an orc oracle. i was told it is for a
paladin quest. possibly the cantrip is for the same, or possibly for
alchemy. as a high lvl shaman.

belphenor
